content: आकर्षः {@--1@} Attracting or drawing towards oneself. {@--2@} Drawing away from, withdrawing; <ls>U. 3. 46.</ls> {@--3@} Drawing (a bow). {@--4@} Attraction, fascination. {@--5@} Spasm. {@--6@} Playing with dice; आकर्षस्तेऽवाक्फलः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--7@} A die or dice. {@--8@} A board for a game with dice. {@--9@} An organ of sense. {@--10@} A magnet, a loadstone. {@--11@} A touch-stone.
